name: Super Nova's Symphony
description:
Background

Super Nova’s Symphony is a science fiction rhythm game with RPG elements where you play as Nova, a violinist onboard a space train on her way to a music tournament at the core of the universe. Explore cosy train cars as you challenge the travellers to music-battles where you pull off button combinations in exciting rhythm sequences. Over the course of the journey, you will discover Nova’s past... and perhaps her true self.

Features
  • Unique combination of turn-based tactics and rhythm gameplay.
  • Explore different levels with distinct musical genres to match the characters.
  • Original Soundtrack that matches the melodies you play.
  • Unravel Nova's personal story.
  • Anime/cartoon inspired style
